name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: "3.8"

      - name: venv environment
        run: |
          python -m venv venv
          source venv/bin/activate

      - name: Run tests
        run: |
          python -m unittest test/test_main.py
